main event: A witness reported sighting an unidentified flying object on July 26, 1967, around 9:30 PM EDT in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes, The witness described the object as a bright light that appeared and disappeared randomly, The object was fuzzy when viewed through binoculars, The investigation suggested it was likely the planet Venus, The witness had experience in astronomy and had seen various astronomical phenomena before.
witness description: 21-year-old male with a decade of astronomy experience
